noWarning.title: No Infection Warning
noWarning.description: There are currently no warnings for You.

warning.title: Infection warning
warning.description: We have calculated that You are possibly infected.

inSync.lastUpload: Your data has been uploaded to {val}.
inSync.connected: You are connected to the Internet.

active.title: Location tracking is active
active.lastUpdate: Your location was last recorded a Minute ago.

inaccurate.title: Location tracking inactive
inaccurate.lastUpdate: GPS is currently too imprecise. Please use OHIOH QR-Codes, or add Your location manually.

deactivated.title: Location tracking from
deactivated.lastUpdate: You have disabled the Location tracking in the settings.

inactive.title: No data stored
inactive.description: You have not yet entered any user data.

welcome.title: Welcome to OHIOH
welcome.description: You will be guided in the Following step-by-step to the App.
welcome.advice: Swipe left for the next step!

language.title: Welcome
language.advice: The language can later be changed in the preferences.

what.title: What is OHIOH?
what.description: OHIOH is for Our Health In Our Hands. The aim of the OHIOH App is to curb the spread of viruses. The OHIOH early warning system uses three data sources (GPS, QR-Code, Bluetooth), in order to inform You about a possible risk of infection by Your residence location. The App allows you to a warning before symptoms of infection show.

warning.title: How does the early warning?
warning.description: The chains of Infection are of concern to everyone of us. The provision of contact details is in this Situation, it is essential. The use of data sources of the mobile phone allows you to Track the chain of Infection. Your data are useful. You decide which data will be transmitted and how long is it stored.

security.title: How safe is my data?
security.description:
We make sure that neither Your personal data, Your location data will be stored and to prevent unauthorised access by encryption and the observance of high safety standards.

In the aftermath of the pandemic will be deleted, Your data is automatically complete. Of course You can also manually delete all of the data.

video.title: How the App works?
video.description: In the following Video You can learn more about the App:

userData.title: User data
userData.description: Here You can enter Your data. No fields need to be filled.
userData.firstNameMaxLengthMessage: The first name may not exceed {val} characters.
userData.lastNameMaxLengthMessage: The last name may not exceed {val} characters.
userData.phoneMaxLengthMessage: The phone number may not be longer than {val} characters in length.
userData.minAgeValidationMessage: Your age must be greater than {val} year.
userData.maxAgeValidationMessage: Your age must be less than {val} years.
userData.cityMaxLengthMessage: The residence must not exceed {val} characters.

motivation.title: Formation and Motivation
motivation.description: At the Hackathon, the Federal government started it all. Through the framework, among other things, the OHIOH Team could quickly find themselves together in Teams. Since then, a concept, a website and App are from the idea of OHIOH become.

team.title: Team
team.description: The project OHIOH would not have been possible without the help of many individuals possible. It is unbelievable how these people without a reward for you ... no for all of us ... your the Best. Therefore, a small thanks to all of you:
team.university: The Professor*s*in the University of applied Sciences Kiel
team.thankYou: Thank you for the good cooperation!

infectionWarning.title: Infection warning
infectionWarning.description: We have identified an increased risk of infection.
